item.title: Hugo vs Jekyll
item.description: Developer Problems As developers we always want to start writing our own blogs and give something back to the community which always has got our backs, but its something that we mostly never get around to (well thats me anyways). Who has time to write your own blogs when you have deadlines and prod bugs. But even if we make up our mind to start writing and clear on of your weekend schedules, there comes The Paradox of Choice medium, ghpages etc etc.
